GtvCellClass* gtv_cell_class ( void   ) 

The basic class for cells (volume elements) in GTV.

Returns:
the GtvCellClass

GSList* gtv_cell_neighbours ( GtvCell *  c,
GtvVolume *  v 
)

Find the neighbours of a GtvCell.

Parameters:
c a GtvCell;
v a GtvVolume, or NULL.
Returns:
a GSList of the cells of v, or any cells if v is NULL, which share a facet with c.

GtvFacet *  f1,
GtvFacet *  f2,
GtvFacet *  f3,
GtvFacet *  f4 
)

Make a new GtvCell from four facets which must define a proper tetrahedron.

Parameters:
klass a GtvCellClass;
f1 a GtvFacet;
f2 another GtvFacet;
f3 a further GtvFacet;
f4 one more GtvFacet;
Returns:
the new GtvCell.

Generate a new GtvCell from four GtsVertex's, making use of any existing GtvFacet's which connect them.

GSList* gtv_edge_cells ( GtsEdge *  e,
GtvVolume *  v 
)

Find the GtvCell's which use a given GtsEdge.

Parameters:
e a GtsEdge
v a GtvVolume
Returns:
a GSList of the GtvCell's of v which contain e, NULL if e is not used by any cells.

GSList* gtv_vertex_cells ( GtsVertex *  p,
GtvVolume *  v 
)

Find the GtvCell's which use a given GtsVertex

Parameters:
p a GtsVertex;
v a GtvVolume or NULL.
Returns:
a GSList of the GtvCell's of v which contain e, NULL if e is not used by any cells.
